title: Google Photos - This app is blocked
body: #### What is the problem you are having with rclone? When trying to authorise Googe Photos Google displays the following error message (after you've chosen the Google Account to use) ``` This app is blocked This app tried to access sensitive info in your Google Account. To keep your account safe, Google blocked this access. ``` #### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`) C:\Users\Kev>rclone --version rclone v1.70.1 - os/version: Microsoft Windows 11 Home 24H2 24H2 (64 bit) - os/kernel: 10.0.26100.4061 (x86_64) - os/type: windows - os/arch: amd64 - go/version: go1.24.4 - go/linking: static - go/tags: cmount #### Which OS you are using and how many bits (e.g. Windows 7, 64 bit) Windows 11 Home 24H2 64 Bit #### Which cloud storage system are you using? (e.g. Google Drive) Google Photos #### The command you were trying to run (e.g. `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`) rclone authorize "google photos" #### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (e.g. output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`) ``` C:\Users\Kev>rclone authorize "google photos" -vv 2025/06/20 09:30:38 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.70.1" starting with parameters ["rclone" "authorize" "google photos" "-vv"] 2025/06/20 09:30:38 DEBUG : **temp-fs**: config in: state="", result="" 2025/06/20 09:30:38 NOTICE: Config file "C:\\Users\\Kev\\AppData\\Roaming\\rclone\\rclone.conf" not found - using defaults 2025/06/20 09:30:38 DEBUG : OAuth only is set - overriding return state 2025/06/20 09:30:38 DEBUG : **temp-fs**: config out: out=&{State:*oauth,,, Option: OAuth: Error: Result:}, err= 2025/06/20 09:30:38 DEBUG : **temp-fs**: config in: state="*oauth,,,", result="" 2025/06/20 09:30:38 DEBUG : **temp-fs**: config out: out=&{State:*oauth-confirm,,, Option: OAuth: Error: Result:}, err= 2025/06/20 09:30:38 DEBUG : **temp-fs**: config in: state="*oauth-confirm,,,", result="" 2025/06/20 09:30:38 DEBUG : Auto confirm is set, choosing default "true" for state "*oauth-islocal,,,", override by setting config parameter "config_is_local" 2025/06/20 09:30:38 DEBUG : **temp-fs**: config out: out=&{State:*oauth-islocal,,, Option: OAuth: Error: Result:true}, err= 2025/06/20 09:30:38 DEBUG : **temp-fs**: config in: state="*oauth-islocal,,,", result="true" 2025/06/20 09:30:38 DEBUG : **temp-fs**: config out: out=&{State:*oauth-do,,, Option: OAuth: Error: Result:}, err= 2025/06/20 09:30:38 DEBUG : **temp-fs**: config in: state="*oauth-do,,,", result="" 2025/06/20 09:30:38 NOTICE: Make sure your Redirect URL is set to "http://127.0.0.1:53682/" in your custom config. 2025/06/20 09:30:38 DEBUG : Starting auth server on 127.0.0.1:53682 2025/06/20 09:30:39 NOTICE: If your browser doesn't open automatically go to the following link: http://127.0.0.1:53682/auth?state=3V4GhPGadiNGlAYmbv0CBw 2025/06/20 09:30:39 NOTICE: Log in and authorize rclone for access 2025/06/20 09:30:39 NOTICE: Waiting for code... 2025/06/20 09:30:39 DEBUG : Redirecting browser to: https://accounts.google.com/o/oauth2/auth?access_type=offline&client_id=202264815644-rt1o1c9evjaotbpbab10m83i8cnjk077.apps.googleusercontent.com&redirect_uri=http%3A%2F%2F127.0.0.1%3A53682%2F&response_type=code&scope=openid+profile+https%3A%2F%2Fwww.googleapis.com%2Fauth%2Fphotoslibrary.appendonly+https%3A%2F%2Fwww.googleapis.com%2Fauth%2Fphotoslibrary.readonly.appcreateddata+https%3A%2F%2Fwww.googleapis.com%2Fauth%2Fphotoslibrary.edit.appcreateddata&state=3V4GhPGadiNGlAYmbv0CBw ``` #### How to use GitHub * Please use the üëç [reaction](https://blog.github.com/2016-03-10-add-reactions-to-pull-requests-issues-and-comments/) to show that you are affected by the same issue. * Please don't comment if you have no relevant information to add. It's just extra noise for everyone subscribed to this issue. * Subscribe to receive notifications on status change and new comments.
